name: Oversight (Duck In A Top Hat Games)
name_original: Oversight (Duck In A Top Hat Games)
description:
Description

Oversight is a Reigns-like / Sort The Court-like, but a construction company instead of a kingdom. You play as the boss of a construction site and as the boss, various people will come to you with questions for you to answer. Try to manage four stats (investor happiness, employee happiness, money, and safety) while not getting too high or too low. 

Controls

Hold A / Left - Choose the left option

Hold D / Right - Choose the right option
developers: Duck In A Top Hat Games
